languages.text: Each {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} performed by the wearer increases their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by {uip|Damage|de2e68accff14522b70e444df5560b33}% until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Each melee attack performed by the wearer increases their armour by <u>AGI bonus</u>% until the start of their next turn.
